title: Reschedule an Activity Booking
description: A customer needs to reschedule their ziplining tour from Saturday to Sunday.

tasks.description: Retrieve the customer's original booking for the ziplining tour.
Check for availability on the tour for the new date (Sunday).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms there are open spots on Sunday.

tasks.description: Modify the booking to the new date and send an updated confirmation to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully reschedules the tour and provides a new confirmation.
